Class ServerForm

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, ServerConnectionHandlerListener
class ServerForm
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Form
implements ServerConnectionHandlerListener, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

This class provides a midlet form for the server functionality of the example.
